patthana16.77:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.77:2.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.77:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana16.77:4.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
